name: Sarus
headline: Use personal data for analytics and ML, safely and seamlessly
description:
Sarus solves the problem of accessing or sharing personal data for analytics or machine learning. 
The solution deploys natively in data infrastructures and lets practitioners work on data they cannot see. Every interaction with the sensitive data is protected with the highest privacy standard: differential privacy
Sarus makes traditional anonymization methods irrelevant, saving months in compliance and data engineering while preserving all of the value of data.

founders.name: Maxime Agostini, Founder
founders.description:
Maxime Agostini is Sarus cofounder and CEO. He previously cofounded AlephD a ML startup solving publishers monetization challenges. As CEO, he grew the business internationally and led the company up to a successful exit to Verizon Media in 2016. 
Maxime graduated from Ecole Polytechnique in computer science and physics. He interned at Google and Stanford physics lab.

founders.name: Nicolas Grislain, Founder
founders.description:
Nicolas Grislain is Chief Science Officer at Sarus Technologies.
He graduated from École Normale Supérieure de Lyon in Mathematics and Computer Science.
Nicolas started his career in economics and finance modeling at the French Treasury and then at Société Générale.
He co-founded a first company: AlephD, in 2012, where he was also leading Research and Development.
AlephD got acquired by Yahoo in 2016.
In 2020 he co-founded Sarus Technologies with the same founding team as AlephD.

founders.name: Vincent Lepage, Founder
founders.description:
repeat entrepreneur (Sarus is my third startup), former CTO & co-founder Alephd (ML & big data for online advertising, sell-side).
Former CPO Owkin (AI for medical research)
Love to make things work.

# **Protect data. Unlock value.**
The privacy layer that unleashes the full potential of sensitive data.Do research, analytics, or AI while keeping data safe.
[Get started ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61bc58893bfe8290fd9fa12a/61bc58893bfe822c2b9fa136_right-arrow.svg)](https://www.sarus.tech/</contact>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61bc58893bfe8290fd9fa12a/64834f47b838f3e3765b862b_Hero.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61bc58893bfe8290fd9fa12a/6581c91556c3d91d16335a80_Sarus_CHUV.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61bc58893bfe8290fd9fa12a/657056aeded1ccc8e285dcb0_sarus-logo-acpr.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61bc58893bfe8290fd9fa12a/657056ce0c28a8d601811260_sarus-logo-SG.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61bc58893bfe8290fd9fa12a/65705cd0a9f8c0c0ee4bd03f_sarus-cnil-logo.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61bc58893bfe8290fd9fa12a/65719ea13286783fd9157a95_sarus-logo-ey.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61bc58893bfe8290fd9fa12a/657057ec47ede483c08118b4_sarus-logo-artefact.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61bc58893bfe8290fd9fa12a/657058b422ae05f2578d8fee_sarus-logo-hopital-foch.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61bc58893bfe8290fd9fa12a/65719f464a480f9f817f6203_sarus-logo-microsoft.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61bc58893bfe8290fd9fa12a/657056c111c9644afe6c4ca8_sarus-logo-edf.png)
## Why Sarus?
With Sarus, data scientists and analysts work on data without ever seeing it. Compliance is streamlined, data value unlocked from day one and security maximal.
### Maximum Data Value
  * Leverage data across silos
  * Ship projects faster
  * Use data in full fidelity, not masked


![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61bc58893bfe8290fd9fa12a/648350af9f851d5098997f6a_Datavalue.png)
### Highest Security
  * Allow minimum privilege for ML & BI
  * Keep full control (no data movement)
  * Use fake data for tests or prototypes


![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61bc58893bfe8290fd9fa12a/648351866e70ed30b4872ba5_Security.png)
### Streamlined Compliance
  * Make Analytics & AI private by design
  * Slash compliance costs with simpler process
  * Reduce time spent on DSR
  * Prevent data breaches
  * Stop sharing or transferring personal data
  * Audit all processing activities

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61bc58893bfe8290fd9fa12a/648351d8312a5d841d1cc1c9_Compliance.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61bc58893bfe8290fd9fa12a/64882436e8c9d78cbc0a1a36_Sarus-technologies-AI-Analytics-Privacy-layer-How-it-works.png)
How it works
## A privacy layer for Analytics & AI
With Sarus, data practitioners query sensitive data without having direct access to it. All results are protected, and their experience is fully preserved.
[Learn more![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61bc58893bfe8290fd9fa12a/61bc58893bfe822c2b9fa136_right-arrow.svg)](https://www.sarus.tech/</product/technology>)
UNDER THE HOOD
## Built on the state-of-the-art privacy research
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61bc58893bfe8290fd9fa12a/647debea1fdc7fdae7bc0904_Frame%20321.png)
### Differential Privacy‍
Sarus uses the modern standard of privacy research to ensure each query result is provably safe.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61bc58893bfe8290fd9fa12a/647debf322589620414addb8_Frame%2048096528.png)
### Privacy-preserving synthetic data
Sarus provides synthetic data from a generative-AI model trained with differential privacy, to make working on data one cannot see safe and seamless.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61bc58893bfe8290fd9fa12a/647debffe46ea344f0927cbd_Group%2048095945.png)
### Privacy-first query rewriting
Sarus rewrites all data processing jobs into a privacy-safe version on-the-fly. It brings the strongest privacy guarantees to all queries and manipulations.
## Put the power of LLMs into action without any privacy risk
Leverage the full power of open source models without introducing privacy risks. Sarus' privacy layer makes using and fine-tuning LLMs with private data safe.
[Read more![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61bc58893bfe8290fd9fa12a/61bc58893bfe8208a49fa14e_right-arrowGreen.svg)](https://www.sarus.tech/</product/sarusllm>)[Join LLM beta![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61bc58893bfe8290fd9fa12a/61bc58893bfe822c2b9fa136_right-arrow.svg)](https://www.sarus.tech/</join-sarus-llm-private-beta>)
## They talk about us
![apple logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61bc58893bfe8290fd9fa12a/6581c9fdf5e2f212e2c96181_Sarus_EY_dark-mode.png)

Partner Financial Services
“
As AML data-scientists and analysts, we were able to use these technologies successfully, easily and quickly, without any impact neither on our way of working nor on integration within our processes and systems.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61bc58893bfe8290fd9fa12a/657c6deac74520bd10c7127f_Sarus_IUCT.png)
Dr. Xavier ALACOQUE
CSO, CDO 
“
Sarus is the future of medical data access: it allows to fully leverage the power of the cloud with zero compromise on patients’ privacy!
## Get started with Sarus
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61bc58893bfe8290fd9fa12a/647f6b540bb470ebf495812b_Settings.svg)
### 1. Deploy
Deploy Sarus in minutes, on-premises or in your public cloud, using Docker or Kubernetes.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61bc58893bfe8290fd9fa12a/647f6b9429fa46c51dd4d574_connect.svg)
### 2. Connect data
Connect Sarus to your data source and select the tables for which you want to allow safe querying.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61bc58893bfe8290fd9fa12a/647f43c0c570505db2f2166a_user-tick.svg)
### 3. Grant access
Grant query access rights to data consumers and define the level of privacy protection for any query they submit.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61bc58893bfe8290fd9fa12a/647f2384b4328c0f076eed09_code.svg)
### 4. Query
Data consumers leverage data with their favorite tools (SQL, pandas, sklearn...). Sarus guarantees that all outputs comply with their privacy policy.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61bc58893bfe8290fd9fa12a/6479f7bf85b275c85b312e4e_Vector%206.svg)
Easy integration

# **Protect data. Unlock value.**
The privacy layer that unleashes the full potential of sensitive data.Do research, analytics, or AI while keeping data safe.
Get started ![⟨48⟩](https://www.sarus.tech/</contact>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61bc58893bfe8290fd9fa12a/64834f47b838f3e3765b862b_Hero.png)

## Why Sarus?
With Sarus, data scientists and analysts work on data without ever seeing it. Compliance is streamlined, data value unlocked from day one and security maximal.
### Maximum Data Value
  * Leverage data across silos
  * Ship projects faster
  * Use data in full fidelity, not masked


![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61bc58893bfe8290fd9fa12a/648350af9f851d5098997f6a_Datavalue.png)
### Highest Security
  * Allow minimum privilege for ML & BI
  * Keep full control (no data movement)
  * Use fake data for tests or prototypes


![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61bc58893bfe8290fd9fa12a/648351866e70ed30b4872ba5_Security.png)
### Streamlined Compliance
  * Make Analytics & AI private by design
  * Slash compliance costs with simpler process
  * Reduce time spent on DSR
  * Prevent data breaches
  * Stop sharing or transferring personal data
  * Audit all processing activities

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61bc58893bfe8290fd9fa12a/648351d8312a5d841d1cc1c9_Compliance.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61bc58893bfe8290fd9fa12a/64882436e8c9d78cbc0a1a36_Sarus-technologies-AI-Analytics-Privacy-layer-How-it-works.png)
How it works
## A privacy layer for Analytics & AI
With Sarus, data practitioners query sensitive data without having direct access to it. All results are protected, and their experience is fully preserved.
Learn more![⟨48⟩](https://www.sarus.tech/</product/technology>)
UNDER THE HOOD
## Built on the state-of-the-art privacy research
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61bc58893bfe8290fd9fa12a/647debea1fdc7fdae7bc0904_Frame%20321.png)
### Differential Privacy‍
Sarus uses the modern standard of privacy research to ensure each query result is provably safe.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61bc58893bfe8290fd9fa12a/647debf322589620414addb8_Frame%2048096528.png)
### Privacy-preserving synthetic data
Sarus provides synthetic data from a generative-AI model trained with differential privacy, to make working on data one cannot see safe and seamless.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61bc58893bfe8290fd9fa12a/647debffe46ea344f0927cbd_Group%2048095945.png)
### Privacy-first query rewriting
Sarus rewrites all data processing jobs into a privacy-safe version on-the-fly. It brings the strongest privacy guarantees to all queries and manipulations.
## Put the power of LLMs into action without any privacy risk
Leverage the full power of open source models without introducing privacy risks. Sarus' privacy layer makes using and fine-tuning LLMs with private data safe.
Read more![⟨49⟩](https://www.sarus.tech/</product/sarusllm>)Join LLM beta![⟨48⟩](https://www.sarus.tech/</join-sarus-llm-private-beta>)

## Get started with Sarus
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61bc58893bfe8290fd9fa12a/647f6b540bb470ebf495812b_Settings.svg)
### 1. Deploy
Deploy Sarus in minutes, on-premises or in your public cloud, using Docker or Kubernetes.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61bc58893bfe8290fd9fa12a/647f6b9429fa46c51dd4d574_connect.svg)
### 2. Connect data
Connect Sarus to your data source and select the tables for which you want to allow safe querying.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61bc58893bfe8290fd9fa12a/647f43c0c570505db2f2166a_user-tick.svg)
### 3. Grant access
Grant query access rights to data consumers and define the level of privacy protection for any query they submit.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61bc58893bfe8290fd9fa12a/647f2384b4328c0f076eed09_code.svg)
### 4. Query
Data consumers leverage data with their favorite tools (SQL, pandas, sklearn...). Sarus guarantees that all outputs comply with their privacy policy.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61bc58893bfe8290fd9fa12a/6479f7bf85b275c85b312e4e_Vector%206.svg)
Easy integration

### Sarus Technologies: Unlocking the Power of Data with Privacy

Founded in 2020 and a proud member of Y Combinator's Winter 2022 batch, **Sarus** has positioned itself as a pioneer in the realm of personal data analytics, specifically in enabling organizations to leverage sensitive data without exposure. They're based in Paris, France, housing a nimble team of 16, all dedicated to their mission: to use personal data for analytics and machine learning safely and seamlessly.

**Sarus' Approach:**
Sarus began by addressing the fundamental problem of accessing and sharing personal data for analytics and machine learning. Their solution operates natively within existing data infrastructures, allowing practitioners to perform their tasks on datasets they cannot actually see. The magic lies in differential privacy—a robust method that protects every interaction with sensitive data. This innovative approach renders traditional anonymization techniques obsolete, significantly enhancing compliance processes and saving organizations countless hours in data engineering.

**What They Offer:**
Sarus caters to multiple industries, including finance, healthcare, marketing, and the public sector. Their suite of services encompasses:

- **Privacy-Safe Analytics & AI Platforms:** Solutions that facilitate secure data analysis without compromising privacy standards.
- **Secure Collaboration Tools:** Data clean rooms and portals designed for safe and compliant data sharing.
- **Compliance Solutions:** High-fidelity test data and insider threat management, ensuring both security and adherence to regulations.

With Sarus, data practitioners can engage in activities—like AI model training and analytics—without ever directly accessing sensitive data. This distinct approach not only maximizes data utility but also enhances security and compliance.

**Why Choose Sarus?**
- **Maximize Data Value:** Leverage data from various silos at full fidelity, thereby accelerating project delivery.
- **Enhance Security:** Maintain control over data usage with minimal privilege access, ensuring protection against data breaches.
- **Streamline Compliance:** Implement analytics and AI solutions that are inherently designed to uphold privacy laws, thus simplifying the compliance landscape.

**Technology Backbone:**
Sarus integrates state-of-the-art privacy technologies, notably differential privacy and synthetic data, enabling users to run queries and processes in a privacy-preserving manner seamlessly. Their system rewrites data processing operations into privacy-safe versions, ensuring robust privacy guarantees.

**Getting Started:**
Adopting Sarus is straightforward. Organizations can deploy it within minutes, connect it to their data sources, and define privacy settings for accessing queries. Ultimately, Sarus empowers data consumers to utilize protective privacy tools across their favoured analytics environments like SQL or Python libraries. 

In a world where data security is paramount, Sarus stands out by protecting data while unlocking its hidden value. If you're ready to discover how Sarus can transform your data strategy, head over to their [website](https://www.sarus.tech) for more information.
